com.ziluck.factions.base

Interface FactionStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoadFactionStore, MongoFactionStore

    public interface FactionStore
    The base system to store Factions and the areas that they have claimed.
    Author:
    Michael Ziluck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FactionCreateEvent createFaction(User creator, String name, FactionType type)
      Creates a new Faction with the given creator, the given name, and the given type.
      Faction getCasedFaction(String name)
      Same as getFaction(String), but it is case-sensitive.
      List<Claim> getClaims(BoundedArea area)
      Gets all Claims within the given bounded area.
      Faction getFaction(BlockColumn column)
      Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular BlockColumn.
      Faction getFaction(LazyLocation location)
      Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular LazyLocation.
      Faction getFaction(Location location)
      Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular Location.
      Faction getFaction(long id)
      Get a faction referenced by its internal id.
      Faction getFaction(Player player)
      Gets the Faction of the given Player.

      Gets a Faction referenced by its name.

      Gets the Faction of the given User.

      Gets a Faction referenced by a player's UUID.

      Returns all factions.

      Gets all Factions that have claims within the given bounded area.

      Faction getWilderness()
      Returns the Wilderness.
      void incrementNextId()
      Increment the id given to the next Faction.
      void loadFactions()
      Load the Factions from the database to run time.
      void save(Faction faction)
      Saves the given Faction to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        static FactionStore getInstance()
        Returns:
        the singleton instance stored in the Factions main class.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(long id)
        Get a faction referenced by its internal id. If none is found this will return null.
        Parameters:
        id - the internal id of the Faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(String name)
        Gets a Faction referenced by its name. If none is found this will return null. Also, this method is not case-sensitive. For case sensitive name lookup, use getCasedFaction(String).
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getCasedFaction

        Faction getCasedFaction(String name)
        Same as getFaction(String), but it is case-sensitive.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(Location location)
        Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular Location. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(LazyLocation location)
        Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular LazyLocation. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(BlockColumn column)
        Gets a Faction that has a claim at a particular BlockColumn. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        column - the BlockColumn of the faction.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFactions

        List<Faction> getFactions(BoundedArea area)
        Gets all Factions that have claims within the given bounded area. If none are found, this returns an EMPTY List; it will not return a List with the Wilderness in it. This method will never return null.
        Parameters:
        area - the area to search within.
        Returns:
        all Factions if any exist.

      • getClaims

        List<Claim> getClaims(BoundedArea area)
        Gets all Claims within the given bounded area. If none are found, this returns an EMPTY List. It will not return a List with the Wilderness in it. This method will never return null.
        Parameters:
        area - the area to search within.
        Returns:
        all Factions if any exist.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(UUID uuid)
        Gets a Faction referenced by a player's UUID. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the uuid of the Player.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(User user)
        Gets the Faction of the given User. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        user - the user.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getFaction

        Faction getFaction(Player player)
        Gets the Faction of the given Player. If none is found this will return Wilderness, not null.
        Parameters:
        player - the player.
        Returns:
        the Faction if one exists.

      • getWilderness

        Faction getWilderness()
        Returns the Wilderness.
        Returns:
        the Wilderness.

      • getFactions

        Collection<Faction> getFactions()
        Returns all factions. The collection that this method returns should NOT be modified at all. If it is, an UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        all factions.

      • createFaction

        FactionCreateEvent createFaction(User creator,
                                 String name,
                                 FactionType type)
        Creates a new Faction with the given creator, the given name, and the given type.
        Parameters:
        creator - the User that created the Faction.
        name - the name of the new Faction.
        type - the type of the Faction.
        Returns:
        the newly created Faction.

      • incrementNextId

        void incrementNextId()
        Increment the id given to the next Faction.

      • loadFactions

        void loadFactions()
        Load the Factions from the database to run time.

      • save

        void save(Faction faction)
        Saves the given Faction to the database.
        Parameters:
        faction - the faction to save.
